headline: A year on from ‘drill, baby, drill’, why are there fewer oil rigs in the US?
summary: US President Donald Trump promised to ‘drill, baby, drill’. After a year in office, the US oil rig count is steadily declining, but production is on the up.

raw.headline: A year on from ‘drill, baby, drill’, why are there fewer oil rigs in the US?
raw.summary: US President Donald Trump promised to ‘drill, baby, drill’. After a year in office, the US oil rig count is steadily declining, but production is on the up.

headline: Baker Hughes, Hunt Oil Sign Framework to Extend Life of Mature Oil Fields
summary: Baker Hughes and Hunt Oil Company have signed a global joint framework agreement aimed at redeveloping mature oil and gas fields and extending the life of aging assets

raw.headline: Baker Hughes, Hunt Oil Sign Framework to Extend Life of Mature Oil Fields
